Welcoming Vishal Noronha

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=436&user=10620> 	

Vishal Noronha joins our Group as our new VP of Procurement, reporting directly to Tracey Griffin. In his new role, he will support our procurement transformation, drive digitalization, and enhance strategic cost management. Vishal will play a crucial role in shaping our procurement strategy, improving efficiencies, and contributing to the Group’s overall success.
Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=437&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-3-min.png> 	

Celebrate Ramadan with TUMI

Vishal Noronha joins our Group as our new VP of Procurement, reporting directly to Tracey Griffin. In his new role, he will support our procurement transformation, drive digitalization, and enhance strategic cost management. Vishal will play a crucial role in shaping our procurement strategy, improving efficiencies, and contributing to the Group’s overall success.
Read more <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=437&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-3-min.png> 	

Celebrate Ramadan with TUMI

Under the stars, every journey finds its meaning. From golden sands to endless skies, let the spirit of Ramadan guide your path. Celebrate timeless journeys with TUMI. 

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=438&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-4-min.png> 	

Karl Lagerfeld Ramadan Collection

Captured in quiet thought, draped in elegance, moving with ease. As day transitions to night, the spirit of Ramadan comes to life. 

KARL LAGERFELD capsule collection available now in all stores.

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=439&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/04-2-min.png> 	
IWD Celebrations around our offices 
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=440&user=10620> 	

HO2 honored the incredible women who inspire, lead, and make a difference every day with a well-deserved break filled with laughter, creativity, and connection.

chunks.text:
<https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=439&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/04-2-min.png> 	
IWD Celebrations around our offices 
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=440&user=10620> 	

HO2 honored the incredible women who inspire, lead, and make a difference every day with a well-deserved break filled with laughter, creativity, and connection. 

We believe in the power of self-expression, self-reflection, and personal growth. This IWD, our Egypt office embraced creativity through painting on mirrors—a reflection of self-love—and crafting macramé keychains, taking the time to truly unwind and reflect.

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=441&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/05-5-min.png> 	

FACES UNVEILS AR SNAPCHAT MALL

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=442&user=10620> 	

Faces unveils our exclusive immersive AR Snapchat mall, part of our Ramadan Rituals campaign. 
As we embrace the spirit of Ramadan, Faces offers a unique and engaging way to connect with our community during this special time of year. Our AR activation is designed to bring the Ramadan experience to life in a fun, interactive way online.
We’re proud to be part of Snap AR Ramadan Mall Season 4 for the third year in a row, as Snapchat continues to enhance cherished moments and create meaningful connections through technology.

chunks.text:
Faces unveils our exclusive immersive AR Snapchat mall, part of our Ramadan Rituals campaign. 
As we embrace the spirit of Ramadan, Faces offers a unique and engaging way to connect with our community during this special time of year. Our AR activation is designed to bring the Ramadan experience to life in a fun, interactive way online.
We’re proud to be part of Snap AR Ramadan Mall Season 4 for the third year in a row, as Snapchat continues to enhance cherished moments and create meaningful connections through technology.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/06-7-min.png> 	

Versace FW 2025 Collection

Be yourself. Believe in yourself. Break the rules. The Versace Fall-Winter 2025 Women’s and Men’s Collections affirm the House’s eternal ethos in an instinctive and authentic expression reinvented for a new mentality. Empowered by visual and emotional motifs intrinsic to the House, Donatella Versace employs the past as a road to the future, paved with the timeless values of Versace: freedom, individuality and integrity. As a metaphor for what’s on the inside, the furnishings of Versace Home are rewoven into wardrobes charged with new energy.
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=443&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/07-1-min.png> 	

Join our Talktime webinars!

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/50801394fffcb01139cddc66da5d6067570046264.jpeg>

chunks.text:
Be yourself. Believe in yourself. Break the rules. The Versace Fall-Winter 2025 Women’s and Men’s Collections affirm the House’s eternal ethos in an instinctive and authentic expression reinvented for a new mentality. Empowered by visual and emotional motifs intrinsic to the House, Donatella Versace employs the past as a road to the future, paved with the timeless values of Versace: freedom, individuality and integrity. As a metaphor for what’s on the inside, the furnishings of Versace Home are rewoven into wardrobes charged with new energy.
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=443&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/07-1-min.png> 	

Join our Talktime webinars!

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/50801394fffcb01139cddc66da5d6067570046264.jpeg> 	

Your health and wellbeing matter to us, and we want to ensure you have the support you need when you need it. That’s why we’re introducing Talktime, a confidential online therapy platform now included in your medical insurance benefits in the UAE.
Join our webinars to get familiar with the sign-up process, how reimbursement works, and address any questions you may have.

*	Webinar Option 1: Thursday 13th of March – 11 AM to 11:45 AM
*	Webinar Option 2: Monday 17th of March - 11 AM to 11:45 AM

Calendar invites have been sent — we look forward to seeing you there!
